original_title: Kasabian: West Ryder Pauper Lunatic Asylum
overview: Special edition DVD from Kasabian's third album, West Ryder Pauper Lunatic Asylum. Includes live footage from The Union Chapel, The Little Noise Sessions and the Royal Albert Hall for the Teenage Cancer Trust. Also included is Vlad the Impaler (Music Video), Vlad the Impaler (The Making of) and Fire (Music Video).
title: Kasabian: West Ryder Pauper Lunatic Asylum
